name: You Snuck A Water Bottle Into The Movie Theater
name_original: You Snuck A Water Bottle Into The Movie Theater
description:
"You Snuck a Water Battle into the Movie Theater" is an auto-runner on rails where the player tries to escape the police by any means necessary. Use trial and error to know when and when not to jump as police chase you down for your crime. 

Theme: Escape

Credits: 

Simple Town - Cartoon Assets by Synty Studios in the Unity Asset Store, City Scene Included.

Mechanics Code created by Michael Baker - University of Texas at Austin.
